metadata.synonyms: [dir, ll, list, show files, directory listing]
metadata.**description**: Lists directory contents with various formatting options
metadata.**see_also**: `eza` (modern alternative with colors and Git integration), `tree` (directory tree view)

metadata.**description**: A modern replacement for ls with colors, Git integration, and enhanced features
Display directories as trees with optional color/HTML output
metadata.**see_also**: `ls` (basic listing), `eza` (modern listing with tree mode), `find` (search directories)

metadata.**description**: Recursively search for files and directories based on various criteria
Fast, user-friendly alternative to find with regex support
Search for patterns in files using regular expressions
Extremely fast recursive search tool that respects .gitignore
Display directory structure in tree format

metadata.*_critical: `mv` permanently moves/renames files - use with caution

metadata.**description**: Remove (delete) files and directories

Remove empty directories safely

metadata.*_**symbolic_links**: Point to path (can cross filesystems, can break if target moves)
metadata.*_**hard_links**: Point to file data (same filesystem only, survive target deletion)

metadata.*_**files**: Generally use 644 (readable by all, writable by owner only)
metadata.*_**executables**: Use 755 (executable by all, writable by owner only)
metadata.*_**directories**: Use 755 for accessible directories, 700 for private
